explanation: Multiple participants expect BTC to break out upwards from the current consolidation, with price targets above previous all-time highs (e.g. 109k, 120k). The majority of opinions are bullish, referencing technical patterns like the ascending triangle and referencing buying/holding at far lower prices. Only a few negative or neutral opinions are present, and several emphasize holding or being 'long'.
